title: RoutingExplanation
description: Structured explanation of routing decisions for auditability. Captures how and why routing decisions were made, including LLM reasoning when applicable.

decision.description: Human-readable summary of the routing decision

candidates_evaluated.description: Number of candidate edges that were evaluated

elimination_log.description: Log of edges eliminated during routing and why

stage.description: At which stage the edge was eliminated

selected_edge.description: ID of the selected edge (or empty string if flow terminates)

method.description: Method used to make the routing decision

llm_reasoning.description: LLM's explanation when llm_tiebreak was used

metrics.description: Timing and cost metrics for the routing decision

edges_considered.description: Total number of edges initially considered

time_ms.description: Time taken for routing decision in milliseconds

llm_tokens_used.description: Tokens used for LLM tiebreaker (if applicable)
